overview:
Philippe is a technology entrepreneur with a wide range of skills and experience gathered over the past 10 years in various areas of internet and mobile technologies.

He founded the software company SafeBox Solutions Ltd. which is developing mobile applications in the fields of mobile security, cryptography and privacy, and which recently launched a new global messaging platform clickSUMO (http://www.clicksumo.com) offering innovative Bulk SMS and HLR Lookup services.

Philippe Joly is also the Author of “Potemkin, Inc.” a book on entrepreneurship.

Prior to founding SafeBox, Philippe Joly was the CEO and Managing Director of SIMchronise Ltd., a mobile data synchronisation provider, which he co-founded in 2005. Philippe Joly has left SIMchronise in May 2009.
